alert.note: Alert for Converse County Lower Elevations; Niobrara County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 06 at 1:13PM MST until December 07 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 11 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Converse County Lower Elevations and Niobrara County. * WHEN...From 5 AM to 11 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight or high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage.

area.areaDesc: Converse County Lower Elevations; Niobrara County
